anime.description: After going to sleep like normal, http://anidb.net/ch89384 [Tsukishiro Haruto] wakes up to discover something unbelievable - he`s stuck in dream world! Here, witches plague the dreamscape and are more than dreamy figments - they`re the trapped souls of young women who`ve rejected reality and are afflicted by the "Sleeping Beauty Syndrome." As he searches for a way out, Haruto will face the witches and their terrifying powers. Source: crunchyroll

tag.name: themes
tag.description: Themes describe the very central elements important to the anime stories. They set the backdrop against which the protagonists must face their challenges. Be it School Life, present Daily Life, Military action, Cyberpunk, Law and Order detective work, Sports, or the Underworld. These are only but a few of the more typical backgrounds for anime plots. Add to that a Conspiracy setting with a possible tragic outcome, the Themes span most of the imaginable subject matter relevant to anime.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: game
tag.description: Based on an interactive (even if minimally so) form of entertainment software, generally available for PCs, consoles or arcade machines.

tag.name: bullying
tag.description: Bullying is the use of force, threat, or coercion to abuse, intimidate, or aggressively dominate others. One who engages in bullying is known as a bully. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: ED variety
tag.description: Several ED sequences in this anime have either a different song or different animation, maybe even to the point of having a unique ED for each episode.

tag.name: CGI
tag.description: Computer-generated imagery (CGI) or computer animation is the art of creating moving images via the use of computers. It is a subfield of computer graphics and animation. Increasingly it is created by means of 3D computer graphics, though 2D computer graphics are still widely used for stylistic, low bandwidth, and faster real-time rendering needs. Sometimes the target of the animation is the computer itself, but sometimes the target is another medium, such as film.

tag.name: murder
tag.description: To murder means to bring about someone else`s death, by a voluntary act. Whether it comes from the killer`s own hand or by exposing the victim to life-threatening circumstances, the result is foreseeable and sought by the perpetrator. Someone who murders as their profession/job is an http://anidb.net/t2399 [assassin or hitman].

tag.name: suicide
tag.description: One or several characters in this anime commit suicide.

tag.name: 3D CG animation
tag.description: Abbreviation for "three-dimensional computer generated animation" or "computer graphics" (CGI). The traditional 2D art is enhanced by 3D imagery developed through computer modeling software. Done in the right way, this union of 3D in a 2D animated world can be a very beautiful relationship. The difference lies in what lacks the traditional 2D animation all together and may give term to something produced entirely with 3D graphics (such as the 2006 remake of "Appleseed" , 2007`s "Vexille", the 2008 addition to the "Biohazard" series and the more well known "Final Fantasy: The Spirits Within" and "Advent Children").

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: death
tag.description: Death is the state of no longer being alive or the process of ceasing to be alive.

episode.title: 暴食の魔女
The Witch of Gluttony
폭식의 마녀
Boushoku no Majo
episode.summary: After Airi is dumped by her boyfriend for a younger, thinner girl, Haruto finds himself in her dreams, where she is the queen of the Land of Donuts. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 初恋の魔女
The Witch of First Love
첫사랑의 마녀
Hatsukoi no Majo
episode.summary: Haruto ends up in the dreams of an ailing high school girl, whom he befriends, and takes her beyond the confines of the park near her home. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 止まった時間, 12才
Time Stopped at Age 12
멈춰버린 시간, 12세
Tomatta Jikan, 12-sai
episode.summary: One of the killers from a ten-year-old murder case is found dead, and now the witch that killed him is after the other perpetrators. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 電影の魔女
The Witch of Thunder
번개의 마녀
Den`ei no Majo
episode.summary: Haruto finds himself in a dream world with a talking cat and a witch whose games turn violent. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: THRESHOLD
Threshold
Threshold
Threshold
episode.summary: Haruto struggles because he can’t communicate effectively with a witch. When Kanzaki asks Mari for advice about this, he comes across someone who seems to be her real-world counterpart. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ソシテ ダレモ イナイ...
And Now There Are None...
그리고 아무도 없다...
Soshite Daremo Inai...
episode.summary: Haruto and Kanzaki meet a tin man named Yoshitsune who is trying to find a girl named Nene. Just when Haruto and Kanzaki figure out that Nene is a witch, they get sucked into another dimension where Nene spends her days with two boys and a cat. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 人を呪わば穴二つ...
Curses Return Upon the Casters
남을 저주하면 무덤이 두 개...
Hito o Norowaba Ana Futatsu...
episode.summary: Natsuki Kamikawa attempts to commit suicide after being bullied, but instead of dying, she enters the world of her favorite anime, Onmyo Ukiyo Ayakashi-Barai. She is excited at first, but eventually gets sick of doing the same old anime thing. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 凡庸の魔女
The Witch of Ordinariness
평범한 마녀
Bon`you no Majo
episode.summary: World-class figure skater Mirei Saegusa is stressed by her current lifestyle and longs for a normal life. In the dream world, she tries to enjoy a normal life, and Haruto helps by teaching her how regular college kids have fun. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 魔女大戦
The Witch Wars
마녀 대전
Majo Taisen
episode.summary: The former witches who have returned to the real world look for Haruto. As the Thorn Cross Association spreads word of Eve`s awakening to the world, Kanzaki`s younger sister, Yurina, appears as a witch in the dream world. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 棘十字会
The Thorn Cross Association
가시 십자회
Toge Juuji Kai
episode.summary: Kanzaki hears that those with Sleeping Beauty Syndrome have been "blessed by Eve," and goes to tell Haruto that he found a clue about Yurina, but Haruto`s irritated about being unable to leave the dream world and won`t listen. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: α夢次元
Dream Dimension Alpha
α꿈차원
Alphamu Jigen
episode.summary: Haruto meets Jane Doe, a witch doing whatever she wants in the dream world. Haruto and the others are toyed with as they get caught up in her crazy actions and ideas. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アイドルはトイレにいかない!
Idols Don`t Go to the Bathroom!
아이돌은 화장실에 가지 않아!
Idol wa Toilet ni Ikanai!
episode.summary: Misaki, the center girl in the idol group Shark Lady, deals with being bullied, sexually harassed by producers, and the paparazzi. In the midst of that, she is attacked by a stalker and comes down with the Sleeping Beauty Syndrome. Source: crunchyroll
